title: Handwriting/script font?
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317073030im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font_6224.jpg)

Thoughts? Thanks in advance,  
 sophomore.

Font: 

 Suomi Hand Script 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317073030/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")
author: sophomore

comments.content: Very nice handwriting indeed...but just that--handwriting. None of the repeating letters are the same: 3 different a's; 5 different t's; 2 of the n's are close but the other 2, nope; 4 different i's and 2 varying s's and o's. There are a lot of handwriting scripts out there and one that is similar is Adobe's Caflisch script.
